mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, amount, remark, phone, address, user_name, consignee, cancel_reason, reject_reason, cancel_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_time, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) VALUES (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userName}, #{consignee}, #{cancelReason}, #{rejectReason}, #{cancelTime}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryTime}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
